# Race calendar

Counting down the days until the next race!

![Astro 4.4](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Astro%204.4-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=Astro)
![Svelte 4.2](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Svelte%204.2-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=Svelte)
![Pico css](https://img.shields.io/badge/Pico%20css%202.0-black.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
![Iconify 1.1](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Iconify%201.1-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=Iconify)
![Typescript 5.3](https://img.shields.io/badge/-TypeScript%205.3-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=TypeScript)

**2024 race calendar for:**

- Formula 1
- MotoGP
- Superbike

**Tech info:**

- All pages are statically generated (["SSG"](https://docs.astro.build/en/guides/routing/#static-ssg-mode)) into HTML files
- Event date/times and distances are localized with [day.js](https://day.js.org/) in the browser, using [astro-islands](https://docs.astro.build/en/concepts/islands/) hydrating Svelte components

## Screenshots

**Home page**

Overview of every (sprint)race and superpoles for all categories (F1, MotoGP, Superbike.)

![Screenshot home](./static/img/screenshot-home.png)

**Detail page**

Lists, per category, every practice / qualification / sprint / race time and lap count if applicable.

![Screenshot detail](./static/img/screenshot-detail.png)
